Html:
Hello,

I've started experimenting with the library and having issues with TaskEditorDialog.
Using the example of 'using the editor', here's what I'm getting:

Even if I resize the window it doesn't help, it'll keep displaying wrong.
I'm using version 1.61 by the way.

Thanks!
It looks like automatic scaling of the dialog isn't working. Do you have any special settings for system font size or text size? I'd like to try and recreate your environment.
This discussion has been copied to a work item. Click here to go to the work item and continue the discussion.
Please check out the file attached to the work item linked above and tell me if it helps.

I have posted some more feedback on the issue in the work item you created.

EDIT: Forgot to mention, feedback is on 1.6.2.


Thanks again.
